rows.label: xs09040100_MSG0002
rows.name: Some Pathfinders detected another piece of the Lifehold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09040100_MSG0004
rows.name: Woo-hoo! Tatsu do Dance of Discovery![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09040100_MSG0005
rows.name:
We don't know what it is—
which is why we need you to check it out ASAP.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09040100_MSG0006
rows.name:
The coordinates we have for it are
up north of New LA, in Sylvalum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09040100_MSG0007
rows.name: One sec—Sylvalum? Correct me if I'm wrong, but uhhh...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09040100_MSG0008
rows.name: Didn't we just detect signs of a Ganglion presence there?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09040100_MSG0010
rows.name:
Which is why I'm only asking
our top combat units to take this on.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09040100_MSG0012
rows.name:
Consider it done, Commander.
We'll get started immediately.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09040100_MSG0014
rows.name:
I talked to Lao's team as well, by the way.
They're already en route.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09040100_MSG0015
rows.name: You'll rendezvous with them here. Good luck.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09040100_MSG0016
rows.name:
I just pray this is the piece we need.
There's not much time left...[ST:wait ]
